body: It's pretty ironic to call someone fucktard when your nick is fucktard.

The only fucktard here is you, the previous version was digital 1500p, this one is paperscan 3000p. You do not see it because this crappy site downscale and steals the work of EH. Just as the constant re-up of a whole bunch of galleries are not re-up but update (various corrections of works). The problem is not the content but the users of this site.  In passing I piss on you, morons.
Karasu is a god and Miuriduma is a masterpiece, but would you mind to stop reuploading it over and over for years already? Fucktards.
